name: sql-to-csv-exporter
title: SQL to CSV Exporter
description: Execute SQL queries and export results to CSV format
content:
Overview

This application executes SQL queries against SQLite databases and exports the results to CSV format. Built using SQLAlchemy, it provides a flexible way to extract data from databases into spreadsheet-friendly formats.

Features

  • Execute custom SQL queries
  • Export query results to CSV
  • Support for SQLite databases
  • Custom output filename support
  • Automatic column header detection

Parameters

  • Database File: Upload your SQLite database file
  • SQL Query: Enter the SQL query to execute (e.g., SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 18)
  • Output Name: Base name for the output CSV file (default: query_results)
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for the CSV output

Output

The application generates a CSV file with the specified name containing the query results with column headers.

Use Cases

  • Extracting data for analysis
  • Creating data exports for reporting
  • Converting database queries to spreadsheets
  • Data migration and backup
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps_${RANDOM}_${RANDOM}"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "$REPO_DIR/python/sql_to_csv_exporter.py "${dbPath}" -q "${sqlQuery}" -n "${outputName}" -o "${outputDir}"
